verses.verse: Say <WH559> ye unto your brethren,<WH251> Ammi;<WH5971> and to your sisters,<WH269> Ruhamah.<WH7355>

Plead <WH7378> with your mother,<WH517> plead:<WH7378> for<WH3588> she<WH1931> is not<WH3808> my wife,<WH802> neither<WH3808> am I<WH595> her husband:<WH376> let her therefore put away<WH5493> her whoredoms<WH2183> out of her sight,<WH4480> <WH6440> and her adulteries<WH5005> from between<WH4480> <WH996> her breasts;<WH7699>

Lest <WH6435> I strip<WH6584> her naked,<WH6174> and set<WH3322> her as in the day<WH3117> that she was born,<WH3205> and make<WH7760> her as a wilderness,<WH4057> and set<WH7896> her like a dry<WH6723> land,<WH776> and slay<WH4191> her with thirst.<WH6772>
And I will not<WH3808> have mercy upon<WH7355> her children;<WH1121> for<WH3588> they<WH1992> be the children<WH1121> of whoredoms.<WH2183>

For <WH3588> their mother<WH517> hath played the harlot:<WH2181> she that conceived<WH2029> them hath done shamefully:<WH954> for<WH3588> she said,<WH559> I will go<WH1980> after<WH310> my lovers,<WH157> that give<WH5414> me my bread<WH3899> and my water,<WH4325> my wool<WH6785> and my flax,<WH6593> mine oil<WH8081> and my drink.<WH8250>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I will hedge up<WH7753> <WH853> thy way<WH1870> with thorns,<WH5518> and make<WH1443> <WH853> a wall,<WH1447> that she shall not<WH3808> find<WH4672> her paths.<WH5410>

And she shall follow after<WH7291> <WH853> her lovers,<WH157> but she shall not<WH3808> overtake<WH5381> them; and she shall seek<WH1245> them, but shall not<WH3808> find<WH4672> them: then shall she say,<WH559> I will go<WH1980> and return<WH7725> to<WH413> my first<WH7223> husband;<WH376> for<WH3588> then<WH227> was it better<WH2896> with me than now.<WH4480> <WH6258>

For she<WH1931> did not<WH3808> know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH595> gave<WH5414> her corn,<WH1715> and wine,<WH8492> and oil,<WH3323> and multiplied<WH7235> her silver<WH3701> and gold,<WH2091> which they prepared<WH6213> for Baal.<WH1168>

Therefore <WH3651> will I return,<WH7725> and take away<WH3947> my corn<WH1715> in the time<WH6256> thereof, and my wine<WH8492> in the season<WH4150> thereof, and will recover<WH5337> my wool<WH6785> and my flax<WH6593> given to cover<WH3680> <WH853> her nakedness.<WH6172>
And now<WH6258> will I discover<WH1540> <WH853> her lewdness<WH5040> in the sight<WH5869> of her lovers,<WH157> and none<WH3808> <WH376> shall deliver<WH5337> her out of mine hand.<WH4480> <WH3027>
I will also cause all<WH3605> her mirth<WH4885> to cease,<WH7673> her feast days,<WH2282> her new moons,<WH2320> and her sabbaths,<WH7676> and all<WH3605> her solemn feasts.<WH4150>

And I will destroy<WH8074> her vines<WH1612> and her fig trees,<WH8384> whereof<WH834> she hath said,<WH559> These<WH1992> are my rewards<WH866> that<WH834> my lovers<WH157> have given<WH5414> me: and I will make<WH7760> them a forest,<WH3293> and the beasts<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> shall eat<WH398> them.

And I will visit<WH6485> upon<WH5921> her<WH853> the days<WH3117> of Baalim,<WH1168> wherein<WH834> she burned incense<WH6999> to them, and she decked<WH5710> herself with her earrings<WH5141> and her jewels,<WH2484> and she went<WH1980> after<WH310> her lovers,<WH157> and forgot<WH7911> me, saith<WH5002> the LORD.<WH3068>
Therefore, <WH3651> behold,<WH2009> I<WH595> will allure<WH6601> her, and bring<WH1980> her into the wilderness,<WH4057> and speak<WH1696> comfortably<WH5921> <WH3820> unto her.

And I will give<WH5414> her<WH853> her vineyards<WH3754> from thence,<WH4480> <WH8033> and the valley<WH6010> of Achor<WH5911> for a door<WH6607> of hope:<WH8615> and she shall sing<WH6030> there,<WH8033> as in the days<WH3117> of her youth,<WH5271> and as in the day<WH3117> when she came up<WH5927> out of the land<WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt.<WH4714>
And it shall be<WH1961> at that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> that thou shalt call<WH7121> me Ishi;<WH376> and shalt call<WH7121> me no<WH3808> more<WH5750> Baali.<WH1180>
For I will take away<WH5493> <WH853> the names<WH8034> of Baalim<WH1168> out of her mouth,<WH4480> <WH6310> and they shall no<WH3808> more<WH5750> be remembered<WH2142> by their name.<WH8034>

And in that<WH1931> day<WH3117> will I make<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> for them with<WH5973> the beasts<WH2416> of the field,<WH7704> and with<WH5973> the fowls<WH5775> of heaven,<WH8064> and with the creeping things<WH7431> of the ground:<WH127> and I will break<WH7665> the bow<WH7198> and the sword<WH2719> and the battle<WH4421> out of<WH4480> the earth,<WH776> and will make them to lie down<WH7901> safely.<WH983>

And I will betroth<WH781> thee unto me forever;<WH5769> yea, I will betroth<WH781> thee unto me in righteousness,<WH6664> and in judgment,<WH4941> and in lovingkindness,<WH2617> and in mercies.<WH7356>
I will even betroth<WH781> thee unto me in faithfulness:<WH530> and thou shalt know<WH3045> <WH853> the LORD.<WH3068>

And it shall come to pass<WH1961> in that<WH1931> day,<WH3117> I will hear,<WH6030> saith<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> I will hear<WH6030> <WH853> the heavens,<WH8064> and they<WH1992> shall hear<WH6030> <WH853> the earth;<WH776>
And the earth<WH776> shall hear<WH6030> <WH853> the corn,<WH1715> and the wine,<WH8492> and the oil;<WH3323> and they<WH1992> shall hear<WH6030> <WH853> Jezreel.<WH3157>

And I will sow<WH2232> her unto me in the earth;<WH776> and I will have mercy upon<WH7355> <WH853> her that had not<WH3808> obtained mercy;<WH7355> and I will say<WH559> to them which were not<WH3808> my people,<WH5971> Thou<WH859> art my people;<WH5971> and they<WH1931> shall say,<WH559> Thou art my God.<WH430>
